name: Shepard Pie

Insides: 2 cup – Gravy or 1 cup chicken stock

instructions: Boil the potatoes until they are fork soft.
Fry meat until it’s fully cooked on medium heat. Drain oil once finished
Grate onion, carrot, garlic onto drained meat
Add worcestershire sauce, tomato paste, red wine, rosemary, thyme.
Continue cooking until red wine is evaporated.
Mash the potatoes with the butter, milk, salt, pepper, and parmesan
To Asseble: add meat mixture to pie crust (about 2/3 full), smooth potatoes over top until folly covered. Stab a fork through the potatoes to make holes for steam to escape.
Optionally, freeze the pie to be eaten later. Reheat at 350F until heated thoroughly.
